title: Animals of the rocky shore
creator_credit: W. Hugh Baddeley and Hugh Baddeley Productions
brief_description: This film presents creatures of the rocky shore. Close-ups of crabs are shown, revealing the complexity of the mouth parts. In deeper water mullet, pollack and bass are shown swimming. An egg-case is removed from a dogfish and the developing embryo is shown.
